text: Ya unfortunately not seeing instance id, just module id :disappointed:
Bummer, we need to fix this. :soon:

I'm running into an issue where a module works in local proxy but not does not work in production. I'm seeing
```island-runtime.mjs:1 TypeError: Failed to fetch dynamically imported module:```
and
```Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 404 ()```
and
```island-runtime.mjs:1 Failed to load module for island: video-2```
the only "new" thing I am trying is that it's a .tsx island

it might be a naming convention thing? maybe I can't just name it `island.tsx`?
```import Video from "./island.tsx?island";```
I converted it all to JS but I'm getting the same kinds of errors
can someone from HubSpot please take a look?
